_header: Our Father that art in heaven blessed be Thy name
_description: The Pater Noster — eight long lines (aaabbbcc) or three triplets

CULHh611.First Lines:
Hvre fader þat art in heuene blesced be þi nameÞin
                    holi heueriche mote us cumen to frame…
CULHh611.Last Lines:
…And lede us noht in fonding bote silde us fro harm and fro
                    schameand fro alle kennes iueles þuruh þin holi name
CULHh611.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas,  and  James Orchard Halliwell-Phillipps, eds.  
             Reliquiae Antiquae.
         2 vols. London: Smith, 1845: 1.169.
